thread.title: Carnegie Hall And a lot more
thread.title_full: Carnegie Hall And a lot more - Review of Park Lane Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: TravelHacks4U
title: Carnegie Hall And a lot more
text: We booked the hotel because it was close to Carnegie Hall and Central Park and fell in love. Wonderful views and location, and the staff is so professional and welcoming! The room is huge, modern and clean. They offer a happy hour each night. We could not be happier with our pick! Our new go to New York hotel.
